title: Platypus Finance navigates yet another security breach, recovering 90% of stolen assets
description: In the constantly evolving world of decentralized finance (DeFi), security breaches and flash loan attacks are unfortunately becoming a recurrent theme. Platypus Finance, a notable DeFi protocol, recently found itself at the center of another such incident. This marked the third major breach the protocol faced this year. title: Blockchain Festival Asia 2024: Connecting Global Innovators in the Heart of Technology and Finance
description: Singapore, Oct 16 – Singapore is set to welcome the most prestigious blockchain event of 2024 as FINEXPO, a global leader in financial and blockchain events, announces the Blockchain Festival Asia 2024. title: Bridging Tech and Humanity: Foundation Models in Reducing Civilian Harm
description: In August, the Department of Defense (DoD) took a significant step forward in harnessing the power of artificial intelligence (AI) by establishing a Generative AI Task Force. title: Crypto Chaos: Was Monday’s Bitcoin Surge a Calculated Pump and Dump?
description: Bitcoin’s price surged due to fake SEC ETF approval rumors but dropped after Blackrock denied it. Experts call for regulatory action to prevent market manipulation in the cryptocurrency space. title: No More Anonymity in DEXes? KYC Is Coming to Uniswap
description:
DeFi was always completely decentralized. KYC was not done in DeFi projects and platforms. However, it appears that this is coming to an end. Uniswap is about to introduce a KYC procedure to its platform. Is this good or bad for DeFi?So, let’s dive deeper into this case of Uniswap introducing KYC procedures to its […]

The post No More Anonymity in DEXes? KYC Is Coming to Uniswap appeared first on Altcoin Buzz.

title: Gary Gensler Accused of Alleged Role in 2008 Financial Crisis
description:
Gary Gensler, the chairman of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, has come under criticism again following a recent post he made on X – formerly Twitter. Gensler, who has been at the heart of the regulatory onslaught against crypto entities, tweeted that the SEC has adopted a rule Congress directed after the 2008 financial […]

The post Gary Gensler Accused of Alleged Role in 2008 Financial Crisis appeared first on Coin Edition.
